name: You Are Now Breathing Manually
description:
You wake up at the helm of a ship, adrift in space.

Everything is broken... including you.

A voice breaks through the static:

"Breathe in."

"Breathe out."

You Are Now Breathing Manually.

Weekly game Jam - Week 129 - Lost In Space

This is  a work in progress build of a game made for the Weekly Game Jam. Most of the mechanics are there, but currently there is no way to win, but one can drift endlessly through space as long as you are able to keep on top of your ship's systems... and keep on breathing,

All art assets sourced from   https://www.kenney.nl/
